entry.title: [ERI1][DedicatedServers] - Racks E102F10 E102E10 E102E07
entry.content:
Jan 11, 04:57 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 10/01/2023 23:00 UTC
End Time : 11/01/2023 04:56 UTC
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jan 11, 01:44 UTC
Update - Most of the impacted servers are operational anew.
Our technical teams are working on the remaining ones.

Jan 10, 23:21 UTC
Identified - Start time : 10/01/2023 23:00 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in the rack E102F10, E102E10, and E102E07 are no longer responding.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
